title: 116: Master Your Relationships with Conscious Love Expert Mark Groves
itunes:title: 116: Master Your Relationships with Conscious Love Expert Mark Groves
description:
I met Mark at Wanderlust Oahu where we both taught and we couldn’t stop talking about all things love and relationships, so naturally I had to have him on the podcast!

We discuss:
-How to maintain clear communication with your partner
-How to make time for a relationship
-Online dating (and how that’s how my relationship started)
-How to make your dating profile work
-Gender-empowering relationship tips for the 21st century
